1.0.name: wordpress/draugiem-pase
1.0.description: Allows to register, log in and post comments to a WordPress based website by using "Draugiem pase" authentication provided by draugiem.lv social network. To use this plugin, you have to get your App ID and API key by registering your application on draugiem.lv - development section. Plugin replaces user avatars with their draugiem.lv profile pics (may not work with older themes) and shows a link to draugiem.lv profile next to the comments.
